mod.name: Clan Icons
mod.description: all clan icons from 04/02/2017

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - 6th sense (xvm)
mod.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - hitlog (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm hitlog (Shows a log of your total damage for the duration of the game)

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - total HP (xvm)
mod.description: Shows the total combined hp of each team

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - high caliber tracker (xvm)
mod.description: Shows how much damage you need to do to get high caliber

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - win chance (xvm)
mod.description: Show the percent chance of winning when you press tab

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - damage log (xvm)
mod.description: Show the xvm damage log (displays to right of damage panel (lower left)

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - last hit announcer (xvm)
mod.description: Will display a message of who just shot you and for how much

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - vehicle on file announcer (xvm)
mod.description: Visual notification if you vehicle is on fire.@In case the fire in your vehicle isn't enough

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - total efficiency (xvm)
mod.description: Displays at the bottom left, shows spotting damage and assistance damage

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - damage panel repair timers (xvm)
mod.description: Shows a number in the picture of the damaged modules in the players panel

mod.name: Battle Results modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Show the tier of the battle (max tier)@also change which results page is displayed first when you enter the garage from the battle@page 1 is battle summary@page 2 is teams score@page 3 is your detailed battle stats

mod.name: Tank Carousel base modifications (xvm)

config.name: Show "Buy Tank" cell, hide total slots
Show "Buy Tank" cell, show total slots
Show "Buy Slot" cell, hide total used slots
Show "Buy Slot" cell, show total used slots

mod.description: Choose how many tank rows are displayed in your garage.@also enable or disable the xvm garage

mod.name: Tank Carousel cell modifications [requires carousel base mod enabled] (xvm)
Statistics color step modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Choose which color scale you use to display player's tank stats

mod.name: Garage Interface Modifications - Clock (xvm)
mod.description: Enable or disable the clock in the garage. Also select 12 or 24 hour clock

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - gold locker (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from using gold in your garage

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - free xp locker (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from using free xp in your garage

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - default currency (xvm)
mod.description: Change the default form of currency for purchasing shells, consumables, etc.

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - tech tree free xp convert option (xvm)
mod.description: Enable an option where, when trying to research a module or tank, if you do not have enough xp, it will present you with a window to convert enough free xp to research the item

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - Crew Auto return (xvm)
mod.description: Automatically return your crew between tanks

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - removable equipment auto return (xvm)
mod.description: automatically return removable equipment

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - block vehicle if ammo is lower than... (xvm)
mod.description: Prevent you from entering a battle if you vehicle is low on ammo

mod.name: Garage interface modifications - additional server infromation (xvm)
mod.description: Display number of people on the server

mod.name: Marker modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm markers in the game. Disabling them will enable the configurations in the game

mod.name: Login modifications - autologin (xvm)
mod.description: Automatiacly log into the game

mod.name: Login modifications - hide old replay confirmation window (xvm)
mod.description: Will not ask you if you want to confirm loading an old version replay. Will load it automaticly

mod.name: Login modifications - show server ping (xvm)
mod.description: Show server pings from the login screen

mod.name: Login modifications - save last server (xvm)
mod.description: Save the last server that you logged into

mod.name: Login modifications - show servers information (xvm)
mod.description: Show the servers population in the login screen

mod.name: Minimap modifications (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm minimap modifications@also select if the minimap, when zoomed, is shown in the center of your screen or enlarged in the lower right

mod.name: Minimap zoom hotkey (xvm)
mod.description: Change the key that shows minimap zoom

mod.name: Sound modifications (Custom sounds) (xvm)
mod.description: Toggle the xvm sounds

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Server Reticle (pmod)
mod.description: Shows where the server thinks you are aiming. Server crosshair mustbe enabled in game settings.

mod.name: Battle Interface modifications - Penetration ( ) Indicator (pmod)
mod.description: Shows wether or not you can penetrate an enemy, factoring in armor angles and normalization, in the form@ avg_gun_penetration/enemy_effective_armor

mod.name: Zoom Out Config (meters)
mod.description: How far you can zoom out in arcade mode in meters

mod.name: Damagelog by GambitER

config.name: XFT config with integrated hitlog (xvm needed for hitlog)
XFT config with hitlog on top (xvm needed for hitlog)

mod.description: Keeps a list of who shot you and for how much. In OMC config, press right alt to see the player name.@XFT Config Website:@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/338561-0915-xft-integrated-damagelogs-v022a-30-05-2016/

mod.name: Battle Assistant
mod.description: Enables an isometric view from Arty.

mod.name: ExtraAimInfo
mod.description: arty only config only shows@-aimtime@-accuracy@-flight time@old style places it where it was when the mod first came out

mod.name: Autoaim indication

config.name: lock shell travel distance when enemy dissapeared add-on

mod.description: kaeptn configs@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/441413-0917-autoaim-indicationaddins-no-proximity-snapping-for-autoaim-but/page__st__1580__pid__13686506#entry13686506
mod.updateComment: Latest update locks onto a target when manually highlighted, so it is legal now

mod.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ) (not PMOD)
mod.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by (enemy_effective_armor-gun_average_penetration).@Negative number means likely to bounce.@Positive number means likely to pierce.

mod.name: TessuMod, WOT/Teamspeak integration
mod.description: A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

mod.name: SpotMessanger

config.name: active at start, deactivate with F11
inactive at start, activate with F11

mod.description: Sends a chat message that you are spotted in a grid square, along with the "Help!" command

mod.name: LightMod by Polyacov-Yury
mod.description: MUST HAVE ADVANCED GRAPHICS SETTINGS FOR THIS TO WORK!

mod.name: Bullet Damage Indicators
mod.description: Changes the look of the damage indicators when you are shot

mod.name: Inbattle current rating calculation by Ekspoint
mod.description: Shows your current stats ingame. Live updates in game. Downloads latest expected values from the internet.

mod.name: Colored penetration and ricochets on tanks
mod.description: Allows you to see where to penetrate the enemy better, or see where the enemy is penetrating you

mod.name: WoT Tweaker

config.name: Disable tree effects? this is an option?

mod.description: Settings to disable effects and increase framerate for those still playing on Windows 95@also can be used to increase visibility

mod.name: ATAC
mod.description: A notification if an enemy is near you.

mod.description: Shows a CoD style hitmarker whenever you penetrate ( ) an enemy tank

mod.name: Loading Animation
mod.description: Replaces the standard loading animation circle@Illuminati - http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/476721-097-gtos-mlg-mod-continued-by-aimdrol-s3al-dog-in-tenks-especially-rudy/

mod.name: Mastery Badges
mod.description: Changes the mastery badges to CoD style badges

mod.name: MLG Glasses by Aimdrol
mod.description: Enables MLG glasses to drop down on your tank when you are in a light tank and an enemy bounces off of you. Enemy caliber gun must be > 90 mm

mod.name: Illuminati Companion by Aimdrol
mod.description: Show an illuminati pyramid "protecting" your tank after your death. (Or during the battle)

mod.name: Marks Of Excellence
mod.description: Modifies the standard Marks of Excellence on the gun barrels@Aimdrol mods: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/476721-097-gtos-mlg-mod-continued-by-aimdrol-s3al-dog-in-tenks-especially-rudy/@VoPV mods: http://www.awolf.eu/load/mods_world_of_tanks/mods_settings/jaskrawe_odznaki_bieglosci_od_vopv_0_9_14/6-1-0-2313

config.name: Show player spotted status in panels (possible xvm conflict)

mod.description: Shows the total HP of each team at the top of the screen.@High caliber config will show how much damage you need to get high caliber.@players info panel will show the hp of both teams when left alt is pressed.@Show spotted status will show in the players panel when an enemy is spotted. It might conflict with xvm.
